snippet: Christine Andreas, Polly Bergen, Jason Graae, Sue Raney and Tom Wopat performed in “It’s Magic,” a show of songs from Warner Brothers movies, part of Lyrics & Lyricists at the 92nd Street Y.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance of songs from Warner Brothers movies in It's Magic: Nine Decades of Songs From Warner Brothers, the season finale of the Lyrics & Lyricists series at the 92nd Street Y.
lead_paragraph: Christine Andreas, Polly Bergen, Jason Graae, Sue Raney and Tom Wopat performed in “It’s Magic,” a show of songs from Warner Brothers movies, part of Lyrics & Lyricists at the 92nd Street Y.

headline.seo: Lyrics & Lyricists Salutes Warner Brothers at 92nd Street Y
